sentence: As a result, Tim Hutchison was exposed to Grizzards unique humor and perspective, which introduced him to the greatest college football player of the day, Herschel Walker.
author: Chip Towers
title: From far and wide, Georgia fans flock to Indianapolis

sentence: Oh, and a tailback named Herschel Walker.
author: Chip Towers
title: Belief makes Georgia Bulldogs a threat to win it all again
